metadata.synopsis: Vignette: Swooning for the Fists one-liners

0.speaker: Fast Neddio
0.text: I can't resist a man in unform. Or anyone else, for that matter.
0.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, slightly dramatic

1.speaker: Fast Neddio
1.text: Nothing wrong with looking, is there? A man can dream...
1.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, slightly dramatic
